#summary Xinc 2.x feature candidates and release plan.
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

After the big sleep, we will try to get new builds out, with fixes here and there. So we get a useable state of the source.
After the 2.1 release we will try to clean up the source base and add some new features into 2.2 and 2.3 release series.

Main features for the 2.2 series should be SVN and GIT related bugs and features (Code cleanup, merge doubled code, add git support), continuing code cleanup and pear compatible coding standard.

In the 2.3 series I want to fix more problems with the system itself and displaying on the website part.

For 3.0 we will add big new features, more clean up of code base, and switch to newer versions of some projects we depend on (Phing compatibility, ExtJS 4 and so on).

I know the schedule is very long term, I hope to get the releases out before planed.
